data.name: Fynite
data.detailed_description:
You've no clipped out of reality in just the right, or wrong spot. Now you're in the backrooms, welcome to level 0. Good luck, you will need it.

Fynite is a horror, first-person, multiplayer and single-player game.
You can expect to be chased by monsters aka entities.
You can scavenge levels for supplies / weapons to try and defend yourself.
data.about_the_game:
You've no clipped out of reality in just the right, or wrong spot. Now you're in the backrooms, welcome to level 0. Good luck, you will need it.

Fynite is a horror, first-person, multiplayer and single-player game.

data.short_description: Welcome to Fynite, a backrooms horror / thriller game. You've noclipped into the backrooms getting out isn't likely, do you have what it takes?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1030 ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Low Performance Game
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650 ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: You will be chased by entities out for your blood.
